job_description: Controller Assistance We are a global, multi-billion-dollar corporation – and Accounting is vital to reflecting our staggering earnings, profits, cash balances and other financial results. To meet this challenge, we implement best practices, provide general financial support, resolve queries, prepare reports and provide statistics. We also design policies and procedures that adhere to audit standards and conform to FASB and SEC guidance, as well as compliance with GAAP and Sarbanes-Oxley section 404. Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as a Controller Assistance on our Accounting Team in Israel . The work is Hybrid and from our offices in Glil Yam, Herzliya. What you’ll achieve As a Controller Assistance , you will resolve financial support issues and inquiries from both internal and external customers and work with relevant non-accounting personnel in reviewing contracts to confirm company policies are adhered to and financial reporting requirements of the company are met. You will: • Issue of statutory financial statements on time, in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles (GAAP). • Tax compliance with local reporting requirements and preparation of yearly tax reports • Review journal entries and account reconciliations, including supporting documentation, for SOX requirement and accurate reporting • AD-HOC accounting and tax related tasks and providing support to other activities and processes within the Groups finance function • Provide suggestions for improving processes performed within the team Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements • A Certified Public Accountant with a BA in accounting/economics – Must • A t least 1-2 years after an internship in one of the BIG-4 accounting firms. • Excellent Excel skills. • High analytical skills, attention to detail and the ability to analyse multi-detailed schedules. Desirable Requirements • Excellent English (written and verbal) • Solid knowledge of systems and automation tools (I.e. SAP , Oracle , etc) Who we are We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. That’s why we put our team members at the center of everything we do. If you’re looking for an opportunity to grow your career with some of the best minds and most advanced tech in the industry, we’re looking for you. Dell Technologies is a unique family of businesses that helps individuals and organizations transform how they work, live and play. Join us to build a future that works for everyone because Progress Takes All of Us.
